EmailTemplate.name: P3 email waiting list
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge: Further Information Form
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.00NC0000004a6DQ} {!Contact.00NC0000004a6Da}
As discussed, please click on this link to complete this form as soon as possible to provide us with some necessary further information about {!Contact.FirstName} http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a12f0ba6986d95&q1={!Contact.Id}
Completing this form will provide us with information so that we will be ready to accept {!Contact.FirstName} onto the programme as soon as a place becomes available, so it is important that you complete it as soon as you can.
If you have any questions about this form, or if you would prefer to complete a paper version, please do contact us ASAP on contact@the-challenge.org, or by telephone on 020 7921 4404.
We will be in touch as soon as there is any development.
Kind regards.
The Challenge Network
